thread.title: Mike Miller signs one-year deal with Denver Nuggets
thread.title_full: Mike Miller signs one-year deal with Denver Nuggets

title: Mike Miller signs one-year deal with Denver Nuggets
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
The Nuggets signed guard Mike Miller to a one-year deal after the veteran cleared waivers on Wednesday, according to a league source....
